videos.title: A végső csata
videos.description: Chris nagyon nagy bajt csinál és úgy érzi, ezért nem érdemel bocsánatot. Superbook megmutatja a gyerekeknek a világ végét, amikor Isten mindenkinek megítéli a cselekedeteit.

videos.title: A tízparancsolat
videos.description: Chris nem tartja be a túrázás alapszabályait, ezért a gyerekek bajba keverednek. Superbook elviszi őket a Sínai pusztába, hogy megtanulják, mire jók a szabályok.

videos.title: Kezdetben
videos.description: Amikor Chris engedetlen az apjának, komoly zűrzavart okoz a laboratóriumban. Ekkor megjelenik Superbook és elviszi három hősünket a kezdetekhez, hogy tanúi legyenek Lucifer bukásának és az ember engedetlenségének az Édenkertben.

videos.title: Jeesuksen ihmeteot
videos.description: Kun ihmeellinen seikkailu kuningas Jeesuksen kanssa, Chris ymmärtää voiman tehdä ihmeitä tulee vain Jumalalta.

videos.title: Óriás-kaland
videos.description: Chris megijed a zenekari meghallgatáson és inkább hazamegy. Superbook megmutat neki egy olyan bibliai hőst, aki kiállt még az óriással szemben is.

videos.title: A veremben
videos.description: Joy nem érti, Chris miért nem védi meg Tommyt. Superbook elviszi a gyerekeket Babilonba, ahol Dániel megmutatja Chrisnek, hogyan kell helyesen cselekedni, még akkor is, ha az nagyon nehéz.

videos.title: A próba
videos.description: Chris még sosem volt ilyen izgatott, mint most, hogy megkapta a legújabb Holo-9 videojátékot. De van egy beteg kisfiú a kórházban, akinek nem jutott belőle. Superbook mutatja meg Chrisnek, hogy mindig Istent kell az első helyre tenni.

videos.title: Hapo Mwanzo
videos.description: Baada ya kusafiri kurudi mwanzo wa wakati, Chris na Joy wajifunza  kutii na kwamba kuna athari kwa matendo yako.

videos.title: ເສັ້ນທາງໄປ ດາມາກັສ
videos.description: ແສງສະຫວ່າງຈາກສະຫວັນໄດ້ສ່ອງລົງສູ່ ໂປລ ໃນລະຫວ່າງທາງໄປ ມາດາກັສ. ຕໍ່ມາ ພອລ ໄດ້ເວົ້າວ່າ, "ຂ້ອຍໄດ້ຍິນສຽງຂອງພະເຢຊູ, 'ຊອລ, ເປັນຫຍັງເຈົ້າຈຶ່ງກັ່ນແກ້ງຂ້ອຍ?"

videos.title: Krismasi Ya Kwanza
videos.description: Kitabu Maarufu huwapeleka mashujaa wetu kwenye safari ya kugundua mtoto Yesu, Betlehemu, na maana ya kweli ya Krismasi!

videos.title: ປ່ອຍຄົນຂອງຂ້ອຍ
videos.description: ຫຼັງຈາກທີ່ ເດວິດ ພົບກັບຍັກ ໂກລຽທ, ຄຼິສ໌ ໄດ້ຄົ້ນພົບຄວາມກ້າຫານຂອງລາວໃນການປະເຊີນໜ້າກັບຍັກໃນຕົວລາວ

videos.title: Miujiza Ya Yesu
videos.description: Wakati wa safari yao ya kimiujiza na Mfalme Yesu, Chris anakuja kuelewa nguvu za kufanya miujiza zinatoka kwa Mungu tu.

videos.title: ຄຣິສມາສ໌ ຄັ້ງທໍາອິດ
videos.description: ປຶ້ມມະຫັດສະຈັນ ໄດ້ນໍາພາວິລະບູລຸດ ເດີນທາງໄປຄົ້ນຫາ ພະເຢຊູ, ບີໂທແຮມ ແລະ ຄວາມໝາຍແທ້ຈິງຂອງຄໍາວ່າ ຄຼິສມາສ໌

videos.title: ຂ່າວປະເສີດ: ສະໜາມຮົບສຸດທ້າຍ!
videos.description: ຫຼັງຈາກສະໜາມຮົບ ອາມັກດອນ, ຈະບໍ່ມີການຕາຍ ແລະ ການໂສກເສົ້າເສຍໃຈ. ໂຢຮັນ ຜູ້ບອກພະຄໍາ ໄດ້ຂຽນ ກ່ຽວກັບ ການທີ່ລາວໄດ້ເຫັນສະຫວັນ ແລະ ໂລກໃໝ່ ເມື່ອສະຫວັນເດີມ ແລະ ໂລກເກົ່າໄດ້ຫາຍຈາກໄປ ແລະ ທະເລກໍ່ໄດ້ຫາຍຈາກໄປ.

videos.title: Kisa Cha Jitu
videos.description: Baada ya Daudi kukutana na lile jitu Goliathi, Chris hupata ujasiri wa kukumbana na yale aliyoyaona kama nimajitu kwake.

videos.title: Mtihani!
videos.description: Chris na Joy wanajifunza zaidi kuhusu Ibrahimu, Sara, Isaka, na Mjumbe wa ajabu wa Bwana.

videos.title: Wacha Watu Wangu Waende!
videos.description: wanapata kuwa na Musa moja kwa moja akiwaongoza watu kutoka Misri!

videos.title: Yakobo na Esao
videos.description: Chris na Joy wanajifunza zaidi kuhusu Yakobo na Esau na nguvu ya msamaha.

videos.title: ສຽງລໍາຄວນ!
videos.description: ນັກປຶກສາຂອງພະລາຊາໂຍນດານຽວໄປຫ້ອງໂຕສິງ

videos.title: ບົດທົດສອບ!
videos.description: ຄຼິສ໌ ແລະ ຈອຍ ຮຽນຮູ້ເພີ່ມເຕີມ ກ່ຽວກັບ ອາບຣາຮາມ, ຊາຣ່າ, ໄອແຊກ ແລະ ຂໍ້ຄວາມອັນລຶກລັບຂອງພະເຈົ້າ.

videos.title: ອາຫານຄໍ່າສຸດທ້າຍ
videos.description: ຄຼິສ໌ ຮຽນຮູ້ຈາກພະເຢຊູ ຄື: ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າ ພະເຢຊູ ມີຊື່ສຽງໂດ່ງດັງ, ພະອົງກໍ່ຍັງນອບນ້ອມ ແລະ ໄດ້ຮັບໃຊ້ສາວົກ 12 ຄົນ.

videos.title: ຕອນເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ
videos.description: ຫຼັງຈາກທີ່ເດີນທາງກັນຄືນສູ່ຈຸດເລີ່ມຂອງເວລາ, ຄຼິສ໌ ແລະ ຈອຍ ໄດ້ຮູ້ຈັກຟັງຄວາມ ແລະ ເຂົ້າໃຈວ່າການກະທໍາທຸກຢ່າງລ້ວນແຕ່ມີຜົນຂອງມັນສະເໝີ.

videos.title: Ngurumo!
videos.description: Washauri wa mfalme walipanga kumtupa Danieli kwenye tundu la simba.

videos.title: ປ່ອຍຄົນຂອງຂ້ອຍໄປ!
videos.description: ພວກເຂົາໄດ້ພົບເປັນຄັ້ງທໍາອິດທີ່ ໂມເສສ ໄດ້ນໍາຕາມ ພະຄໍາເອັກໂຊດັສ ຈາກ ເອຢິບ!

videos.title: Ufunuo:! Vita Vya Mwisho!
videos.description: Baada ya Amagedoni hakutakuwapo na kifo tena au huzuni. Yohana Mfunuo aandika juu ya jinsi alivyoona mbingu mpya na dunia mpya, kwa maana mbingu za zamani na dunia ya zamani vilikuwa vimepotea. Na bahari pia ilikuwa imeenda.

videos.title: Karamu ya mwisho
videos.description: Chris anajifunza kutoka kwa Yesu kwamba hata ingawa Yesu ni maarufu, alikuwa mnyenyekevu na aliwahudumia wanafunzi hao 12.

videos.title: ພະອົງໄດ້ຟື້ນຄືນພະຊົນ
videos.description: ຄຼິສ໌, ຈອຍ, ຈິສໂມ ແລະ ຟີບີ ໄດ້ກັບຄືນໄປເວລາຍ້ອນຫຼັງທີ່ເຫັນ ພະແມ່ມາລີ ເຊິ່ງເປັນແມ່ຂອງພະເຢຊູ ແລະ ໄມ້ກາງແຂນຂອງພະເຢຊູ

videos.title: Kuelekea Dameski
videos.description: Mwanga kutoka mbinguni unampiga Paulo njiani kuelekea Dameski. Paulo baadaye anasema, "Nilisikia sauti ya Yesu ikisema," Saulo, kwanini unanitesa? "

videos.title: Amri Kumi
videos.description: Kitabu Maarufu kinamrudisha Chris wakati Musa anapokea Amri Kumi. Anajifunza kuwa sheria ziko mahali pa kukulinda - sio kufanya maisha yako yawe ya kufurahisha!

videos.title: ພະບັນຍັດ 10 ປະການ
videos.description: ປຶ້ມມະຫັດສະຈັນ ໄດ້ພາ ຄຼິສ໌ ຍ້ອນເວລາໄປເບິ່ງຕອນທີ່ ໂມເສສ ຮັບພະບັນຍັດ 10 ປະການ. ລາວໄດ້ຮຽນຮູ້ວ່າລະບຽບຕ່າງໆ ມີໄວ້ເພື່ອປົກປ້ອງໂຕເຮົາເອງ - ບໍ່ແມ່ນເຮັດໃຫ້ຊີວິດເຈົ້າບໍ່ສະໜຸກສະໜານ.

videos.title: Amefufuka
videos.description: Chris, Joy, Gizmo, na Phoebe wanarudi nyuma kiwakati ili kukutana na Yesu, mama ya Yesu Mariamu na kusulubiwa kwa Yesu.

videos.title: ຢາຄົບ ແລະ ອີຊໍ
videos.description: ຄຼິສ໌ ແລະ ຈອຍ ຮຽນຮູ້ເພີ່ມ ກ່ຽວກັບ ຢາຄົບ ແລະ ອີຊໍ ແລະ ພະລັງຂອງການໃຫ້ອະໄພ.

videos.title: ຄວາມມະຫັດສະຈັນຂອງພະເຢຊູ
videos.description: ໃນລະຫວ່າງການປະຈົນໄພເພື່ອຮູ້ຈັກກັບສິ່ງມະຫັດສະຈັນກັບພະເຢຊູ, ເຮັດໃຫ້ ຄຼິສ໌ ໄດ້ເຂົ້າໃຈວ່າະພະລັງທີ່ຈະສໍາແດງການມະຫັດສະຈັນແມ່ນມາຈາກພະເຈົ້າເທົ່ານັ້ນ

videos.title: Sarah Laughs
videos.description: Sarah Laughs

videos.title: Abraham Hears From the Angel of the Lord
videos.description: The Angel of the Lord tells Abraham not to touch Isaac and commends him for his faith.

videos.title: God Tells Abraham To Take Isaac to the Land of Moriah
videos.description: Abraham obeys God's directive to take his son to the land of Moriah.

videos.title: Isaac Asks Where's the Sheep
videos.description: Isaac asks Abraham where's the sheep for the burnt offering and Abraham tells Isaac that the Lord will provide the sheep.

videos.title: The Lord Povides
videos.description: God provides the ram for the burnt offering and blesses Abraham for his obedience.

videos.title: Young Isaac
videos.description: Sarah gave birth to a son for Abraham. This happened just at the time God the Father had said it would. Abraham named their son Isaac.

videos.title: Pharaoh’s Decree
videos.description: The Pharaoh decrees that all Hebrew boy babies are to be thrown in the Nile.

videos.title: Soldiers Hunt for Baby Boys
videos.description: Egyptian soldiers hunt for baby boys amongst the Hebrew slaves.

videos.title: Pharaoh’s Daughter Meets Jochebed
videos.description: The Pharaoh’s daughter asks Jochebed to nurse Moses.

videos.title: Moses in the Nile
videos.description: Moses is placed in the Nile in hopes of escape from Pharaoh’s soldiers.

videos.title: The Birth of Moses - The Salvation Poem
videos.description: The message of Christ's love for each of us set to scenes of the Superbook episode “The Birth of Moses”.

videos.title: Young Moses Strikes Back
videos.description: Moses recalls the time he killed an Egyptian taskmaster because he was beating the Hebrew slaves.

videos.title: Let My People Go - The Salvation Poem
videos.description: The message of Christ's love for each of us set to scenes of the Superbook episode "Let My People Go!".

videos.title: Moses and the Burning Bush Pt. 1
videos.description: God speaks to Moses through a burning bush.

videos.title: Moses and the Burning Bush Pt. 2
videos.description: God commands Moses to go to Egypt to help set free the Hebrew slaves.

videos.title: Moses and the Burning Bush Pt. 3
videos.description: God affirms with Moses that He will be with him when he confronts the Pharaoh.

videos.title: Moses and Aaron Meet in the Wilderness
videos.description: Moses and Aaron reunite and determine to go back to Egypt together.

videos.title: Moses and Aaron Meet Pharaoh
videos.description: Moses and Aaron request Pharaoh to let God's people go.

videos.title: Moses Talks to God
videos.description: Moses confronts God after Pharaoh's rebuke of his request.

videos.title: Plagues of Egypt
videos.description: The plagues that Egypt faced because of the Pharaoh's refusal to let the Hebrews go and worship God.

videos.title: The Final Plague
videos.description: Only those with lamb's blood on their doorposts were exempt from their first male child dying.

videos.title: The Red Sea Part 1
videos.description: God commands Moses to lift his staff in order to divide the Red Sea.

videos.title: The Red Sea Part 2
videos.description: The Hebrews pass through the Red Sea just before it closes upon the Pharaoh's army.

videos.title: Superbook: The Ten Commandments - Salvation Poem
videos.description: Superbook Salvation Poem for "The Ten Commandments" —the story of Moses and the Israelites receiving God's laws.

videos.title: Moses
videos.description: Moses

videos.title: Aaron
videos.description: Aaron

videos.title: The Lord Reveals Himself at Sinai
videos.description: The Lord reveals himself to the descendants of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.

videos.description:

Want to Know God? Find out How https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-know-god . Get the latest episodes and help share Superbook https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-share

Joy is upset because she’s in charge of a big service project. She has done all the leadership work but finds no one is doing her bidding with the follow-up details. Superbook whisks the kids off to meet Naaman’s servant girl and follow Naaman’s story through to his amazing cure of leprosy.

videos.description:
Official Full Episode. Watch more episodes and play games for free in the Superbook App https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-app or on the Superbook Kids Website https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-site . Want to Know God? Find out How https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-know-god . Get the latest episodes and help share Superbook https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-share

Joy is embarrassed by video of her eating that was posted online by a girl named Barbara. Joy plans to get even by posting an embarrassing video of Barb taking a tumble during cheer leading practice. Before she can upload the video, Superbook takes the kids back in time to witness miracles performed by the prophet Elisha as he narrowly escapes harm from Syrian soldiers sent to capture him. 2 Kings 6:18

Want to Know God? Find out How https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-know-god . Get the latest episodes and help share Superbook https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-share

When Joy is swamped by many projects, Superbook takes her to meet Daniel in King Nebuchadnezzar's palace. Through prayer, God gives Daniel insight into the King's dream. After Joy returns home, she seeks God in prayer for solutions to her problems.

videos.title: Esther Sends Hatach
videos.description: Esther sends Hatach to speak with Mordecai.

videos.title: Haman Exposed
videos.description: Esther exposes Haman's plans to King Ahasuerus.

videos.title: Meet The Queen
videos.description: Esther shares with Joy how she became queen.

videos.title: Haman and King
videos.description: Haman convinces the King to make a decree to kill all Jews.

videos.title: Esther: For Such a Time as This - The Salvation Poem
videos.description: The message of Christ's love for each of us set to scenes of the Superbook episode "Esther: For Such a Time as This".

videos.title: Esther Approaches the King
videos.description: With the chance of death looming, Esther approaches King Ahasuerus.

videos.title: Haman's Plot to Kill the Jews
videos.description: Haman and friends cast lots to determine when Mordecai's fate will be sealed.

videos.title: New Decree for the Jews
videos.description: Esther and Mordecai ask King Ahasuerus to void the law that Haman created to kill the Jews.

videos.title: For Such a Time as This
videos.description: Esther determines to speak to King Ahasuerus in order to save the Jews from destruction.

videos.title: Superbook - Lazarus - Season 3 Episode 10 - Full Episode (Official HD Version)
videos.description:
Official Full Episode. Watch more episodes and play games for free in the Superbook App https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-app or on the Superbook Kids Website https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-site . Want to Know God? Find out How https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-know-god . Get the latest episodes and help share Superbook https://go.cbn.com/superbook-yt-share 

 Joy hears of a little girl who was too shy to come to the amusement park. Superbook appears and sends Joy, Chris, and Gizmo to the meet Jesus as He delays going to see His friend Lazarus who was sick. By delaying, Jesus is able to perform an even greater miracle – raising him from the dead! Joy learns that God’s timing is always right. Joy, Chris and Gizmo visit the shy girl and create a series of amusement park rides even more wonderful than the real thing. John 11:44

Superbook Season 2 Episode 1 - "Jonah": Joy witnesses Sharon Myers stealing a bike and reports it to the principal. To Joy’s surprise, Principal Travis offers Sharon mercy instead of demanding justice. As Joy questions why Sharon shouldn’t be punished, Superbook transports her, Chris, and Gizmo to meet up with a prophet named Jonah. Jonah is running away from God because he doesn't think the people of Nineveh deserve God's mercy. Through Jonah's experiences, Joy realizes that mercy is a great gift to give as well as to receive.
